name: 100 - First Prompt
initial_prompt: What agents do you have access to and what are their capabilities?

name: 100 - Summarize
initial_prompt: Summarize the capabilities of the agent with sample queries as a HTML report

name: 200 - Trip PLan
initial_prompt: I'm planning a business trip and need a complete travel briefing. First, determine where I am. Then, get the weather forecast for both my current city and Paris, France. Calculate the time difference between my location and Paris.

name: 300 - Strands Agent Calculator
description: Interacting with the Strands Calculator Agent
initial_prompt: What is 10 * 22? Give me the answer and Shakespearean style. The answer should be one short sentence. Use the calculator agent.

name: 400 - AWS Documentation Agent: S3
description: Interacting with the AWS Documentation Agent
initial_prompt: Find information about 'Amazon S3' using the AWS Documentation Agent. Provide a summary of its key features and use cases in markdown format.

name: 400 - AWS Documentation Agent: EC2
description: Interacting with the AWS Documentation Agent
initial_prompt: How can I access a server running on port 9000 in an ec2 instance from my IP address? Also list the factors of my IP address if it was a decimal number not an IP address.
